active.label: Active
active.title: Active Skill: Solar Rain
active.description:
• Apollo will summon Solar Rain in a target area, dealing multiple damages to the enemy.
• Range: 6

passive.label: Passive
passive.title: Passive Skill: I am the Light!
passive.description: • Apollo will increase the attack of all allied units.

legendary.label: Legendary
legendary.title: Legendary Skill: Sun Imprint
legendary.description:
• Apollo will impose a layer of Sun Imprint on every enemy unit Apollo attacks (with basic attack or active skill).
• The first time Apollo attacks an enemy unit, the layer of Sun Imprint is zero (0).
• The Sun Imprint can stack up to 10 layers.
• Every time Apollo attacks an enemy unit, the target unit receives an additional damage that is *Damage of Sun Imprint* × *Layer of Sun Imprint*
• Sun Imprint damage does not stack the number of layers of Sun Imprint.

racial synergy.label: Racial Synergy
racial synergy.title: Racial Synergy
racial synergy.description: • Apollo will increase the basic attack and skill attack of all sacred units.
